results.byline: By Michael Levenson and McKenna Oxenden
results.title: Ex-Nurse Recorded Himself Sexually Assaulting Patients, Police Say
results.abstract: Christopher P. Lambros, 61, was charged with sexual assault after recording videos of himself assaulting unconscious female patients at a Colorado hospital, officials said.

media.caption: Christopher P. Lambros, who worked for 10 years at St. Mary’s Medical Center in Grand Junction, Colo., was fired after his arrest in October.
media.copyright: Gretel Daugherty/Grand Junction Daily Sentinel, via Associated Press
